item.title: There is dumped rubbish on the grass verge that is still outside 32 Reddy Road., 28th September
item.description:

item.title: Dog poo problemat Pinnacle Hill and Sterling road, 28th September
item.description:
Hello, The problem has been going on for few months. There is a teenage boy in our area who is not collecting after his dog. The foot path between Sterling road and Pinnacle hill is covered in dog poo. I have a two year old and we use that path to get to childminder and the Martens Grove. It’s completely unwalkable with a child. We have to go around. This has been brought up numerous times in our neighbourhood groups. I’m aware of the ongoing investigation by the Bexley council. We know exactly who the offender is and where they live. I was told that someone from Bexley council gave them a visit recently with one of the neighbors. They did not open, yet were seen in the window listening. Since then the situation got seemingly worse, as if they are doing it on purpose now showing disrespect to the locals openly. Please do something. This should not be so complicated to resolve. Kind regards P
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Sterling Road, Barnehurst, London
Report on FixMyStreet
